SEARCH
Package sk.hike_de_slovakia.controllers

Class SignupController

java.lang.Object
sk.hike_de_slovakia.controllers.SignupController
All Implemented Interfaces:
SceneController
public class SignupController extends Object implements SceneController
This class is controller for fxml file which display register page where the user can create his account. And also is controller for fxml file which display add user in admin account. This class implements SceneController, because from the display that controls this controller the user can be redirected to the next screen

  • Method Details

    • goBackAdmin

      public void goBackAdmin(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is only used within the admin account, and ensures that if the admin user clicks the back button, he will be redirected to the previous screen.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • goBackNormal

      public void goBackNormal(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is only used for the registration screen. If the user clicks the back button he will be redirected back to the login screen.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • checkEmptyFields

      public boolean checkEmptyFields()
      * This method check if the both textfield for write username and write password is filled. If one of them is not filled the error is shown to the user.

    • clickOnSignUp

      public void clickOnSignUp(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method provides the entire logic of user registration. As well as writing the newly created user to the serialize file.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • addUserAsAdmin

      public void addUserAsAdmin(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method provides the entire logic of add the user in admin account. As well as writing the newly created user to the serialize file.
      Throws:
      IOException
